entry.title: Why are we bleeding nodes?
entry.summary: On 07/04/14, Gregory Maxwell raised concerns about Bitcoin-QT and recommended people to stay away from it. In light of this, Jesús Cea Avión asked for alternative options for those who care about the large 20GB blockchain and don't want to rely on third-party servers. The email includes contact information for Jesús Cea Avión as well as a digital signature.
